body: @Blankman There's a sequel that I've only seen on hitomi.la, could you summarize it? Question what meaning flower language (page 2 and last page) of this story? First there're 2 but last there's one.

So girl has a fiancee you can see him in page 9. Girl gets called back home cus her grandma sick or w.e and her mom tells her she got invited to eat with the head family who that guy is a part of (he's pedo or something in the past and she wanted to get away from him). She gets drunk and he dicks her down and during the call with her fiancee he forces her to say she wants to rethink the marriage and in the end reveals he planned it all out to make her his. The end is her getting pregnant with his baby and I guess being stuck there and the sister suprised she left her boyfriend and married her brother instead and she looks like she regrets it . by the way the reason she goes along with it or w.e is that if she doesn't have sex with him she'll be the one in trouble cus it's the countryside and it'll trouble her family and destroy her marriage if it gets out that they had sex cus she'll rape her either way (yes it is retarded).
